features: Wallet Case for iPhone 11 (6.1in screen, 2019), carry 2 essential cards for daily convenience.
Case is design to hold 2 ID-size cards like credit cards, driver license, metro cards, etc.
The cards or folded bills are hidden and not easy to be noticed, very safe and convenient
Compatible with wireless charger if you take cards out of the case before charging
Case are made of rugged TPU inside to absorb impacts, scratch resistant PC outside for more protection and sleek looking.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vofolen - Slidable Hidden Slot Card Holder Wallet Case for iPhone 11 (6.1" Display) Highlights Buy this wallet case for your iPhone 11 to replace bulky wallet in everyday life!The card slot can carry 2 essential cards (ID, license, credit card...) when you are out.Rugged TPU cover absorb shock and impact from low drops/bumps (within 0.5meter); Scratch resistant PC cover, luxury and stylish, easy to clean, comfortable to hold; Sleek design with multiple color choices to decorate your iPhone 11 and offer protections Warm Tip Please buy a shatterproof screen protector for extra protection against drops and impact.The card slot can be hard to open when first use, it becomes better after few time uses.If case separated into 2 pieces, put them back together then it can be sued again. Troubleshoot - Can't Open the Card Slot? Instruction on How to Use Card Holder Use your thumb to push the slider on top of the left corner.Open the sliding door a little then slide it to the right.Reach cards one by one by the little notch in the top of the left corner. Package 1 x Vofolen Case for iPhone 11 Only, phone and other accessories not include.

Sliding Case for iPhone 11 4-Slot Case for iPhone 11 Sliding Case for iPhone 11 Detachable Case iPhone 11 Double Magnetic case for iPhone 11 Slim Wallet Case for iPhone 11 Highlights Sliding Hidden Slot, Carry 2 ID-size Cards Flip Hidden Slot, Carry 4 ID-size Cards Sliding Hidden Slot, Carry 2 ID-size Cards Detachable Wallet Case with Strap, for 9 Cards Double Magnetic Wallet Case with Strap, for 3-4 Cards Slim Wallet Case with Strap, for 3-4 Cards Support Wireless Charging or Not Please remove the card if you need to use wireless charging Can't support. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't live without it *Update 5/23
reviews.reviewText: I had this type of case for my iPhone 8, and knew I had to get it when I upgraded to the 11. I'm almost embarrassed to say that I can't live without it. I don't like carrying my purse or wallet around with me, and with this case, I'm able to fit three cards in the slot comfortably. Not to mention I've already dropped my phone about ten times on every surface imaginable, and every time, there's not a scratch on the case, or my phone screen. It's durable and makes my life easier, which is all I can ask for.**3 Year Update** As stated above, I'm fairly accident-prone. The case held up to about 3 years of me dropping it nearly every day on every surface imaginable before finally breaking. Towards the end of this little trooper's life, it did have a tendency to break apart (the purple part of the case is not super well attached to the black part) and cards did end up going everywhere, so keep that in mind if you're as accident-prone as I am. Still, with the combination or this and a screen protector my phone is still pretty much fine! I just re-ordered this case, so my phone stands a pretty good chance of survival for the next few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome case. Yes, they do break every now and then and eventually you will have scratch marks (if you’re hard on your things like I am). HOWEVER I have zero problem buying one every 6 months or so because they are SO affordable! It’s also fun to change up the color. I have been using these cases for about 3 years and I have never had damage to my phone while using them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but I keep buying them
reviews.reviewText: These are made so cheaply and break easily with any drop, but I keep buying them because there isn’t a better concept for a phone wallet case. I’ve gone through several other wallet cases and this one is still my favorite, despite being on my 3rd one within 9 months. The good news is the case breaks but my phone is fine every time so it’s doing it’s job. The case is slim, doesn’t affect the camera, and the slide cover does easily slide back and forth. I’ve gone back and forth on giving this a 3 or 4 star. It’s 5 star in the concept, 1 star in quality. I will probably keep buying them because it does exactly what I need it to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Get lots of compliments for pocket for credit cards. Feels light but works great. You can’t wirelessly charge the phone though in most chargers if you have cards in slot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine but fragile
reviews.reviewText: Slim, didn’t add much bulk. Held 2 cards (as designed) easily, a 3rd could be added with a mild bulge in sliding door. Slider door often stuck and didn’t easily open. One time it stuck and required extra effort, when it released it opened quickly, slid all the way out and snapped the case frame. It lasted almost 1 month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this really impressed me. The color is more beautiful than in the picture. The only thing against it is that sometimes is hard to open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and reliable
reviews.reviewText: I love this phone case. I have it in the rose gold and white. It holds 2 cards easily. I have managed 3 before but wouldn’t use anymore than that.I hate to admit I drop my phone often and it’s held together lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price, but didn’t last long
reviews.reviewText: Very affordable and pretty good value, but the plastic piece on the back fell off about under 6 months. Can’t be too upset with the price though.
funciona conforme lo indicado, pero la carcasa es muy gruesa.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un poco más gruesa de lo que esperaba, pero funciona bien.
reviews.reviewText: Perfecta para una tarjeta de crédito y un par de billetes doblados en tres. Me hubiera gustado un poco más delgada en los lugares que no se usan para almacenar la tarjeta, pero el grosor sigue siendo adecuado para su función.
No es tan resistente :(Le caben 2 tarjetas perfecto y 3 justasEl diseño de deslizamiento es un poquito complicado porque no es tan firme la tapitaPero precio-calidad está ok
Easy to put on mobile phone, sturdy and protects the phone.
